modName: Categorized Favorites Menu Quicklist and Magic
summary: Keeps the original quick-list concept spanning two rows, while adding magic schools stacked above equip-sets, potions and \"other\". Utilizes the fact that there is support for different font sizes for the different lists. Oh, and right centered lists because the headings align neater that way.
descriptionHtml:
Why another config?
===================
None of the others are neat or waste too much space on stuff I don\'t use,
why else? Besides, I like tinkering with config files.
[list]
[*] underscores and brackets make things look neat the quick-list
[*] dragon language for sub-list headings because it\'s cool
[*] daft eye-friendly colors in list headings
[*] \"Equipset\" is techy and inappropriate. Replaced with \"Stances\"
[*] \"Other\" replaced with \"Misc.\"
[*] orders magic schools same way as in SkyUI to keep things uniform
[*] keeps items compact while making space between lists for a better overview. 
[/list]

See readme for more info

# changelog:
# 0.2 : Adding daedric artifacts and unique loot
#     : apparel - cloak
# 0.21: Improved Candlelight and Magelight:	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15020
#	Shouts in the Dragon Tongue: 		http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5770
#	Claws of Vokunzun
#	Useful Remains
# 0.22: Better Vampires by Brehanin v4.86
#	Apocalypse Spell Pacakge 1.11
# 	Belua Sanguinare Revisited 1.3.1	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17077
# 0.23
#	SkyRe bows
